categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic awards

nodes.text: The Redbird was a badge award to all personnel of the Alliance to Restore the Republic military who were wounded while fighting. The badge consisted of the Rebel Alliance starbird held by a red ribbon with white stripes on the sides. The Redbird could also be rewarded multiple times, with each time the recipient being given a small starbird pin placed vertically in the middle of the ribbon.

In the new canon, the Redbird badge was mentioned in Lead by Example, a  2016 sourcebook for Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Age of Rebellion roleplaying game. In Star Wars Legends, the Redbird first appeared in the Rules of Engagement: The Rebel SpecForce Handbook, a 1998 sourcebook for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
